rules_text:
{1}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Put a charge counter on The Pearl Tomb of Sëh.
{2}, {T}, Remove two charge counters from The Pearl Tomb of Sëh: Create Sëh's Sceptre, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature has indestructible as long as it's untapped” and equip {2}.
{4}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from The Pearl Tomb of Sëh and exile it: Create Sëh, a legendary 8/8 white Angel Construct artifact creature token with flying, vigilance, and lifelink.
